name: socialize

socialize verb
(GO OUT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 [ I ] to spend time when you are not working with friends or with other people in order to enjoy yourself: I tend not to socialize with my colleagues. I hope Adam's actually doing some work at college - he seems to spend all his time socializing!
More examplesFewer examplesThey're content to socialize with a very small circle of people.We're usually too tired to socialize during the week.I don't tend to socialize with my colleagues much.I've been socializing for the last two weeks.
